attributes.action: fund resarch in deep drilling oil wells/aboitic oil production
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
russia have been using deep drilled wells to pump oil, and are now the worlds leading producer. they have shown that using this type of drilling can tap in to oil any where on earth.
I ask the PM to fund develpment of such drilling operations in this country.
